abstract: A member of the founding family of Anheuser-Busch said any talks with Belgian brewer InBev should be based on shareholder value rather than the Busch family’s legacy, The Wall Street Journal reported.
lead_paragraph: A member of the founding family of Anheuser-Busch said any talks with Belgian brewer InBev should be based on shareholder value rather than the Busch family’s legacy, The Wall Street Journal reported.

headline.main: A Busch Says Deal Would Be a Matter of Value, Not Legacy
